description: The trail winds and switchbacks steadily upwards through forest with few opportunities to catch your breath. The tree cover doesn't allow for many viewpoints along the way but the summit boasts a full panorama of prairie, foothills, and snowy peaks!NTS Map:082O02
directions: From Calgary, turn south off of Hwy 1 onto Sibbald Creek Trail (Hwy 68). Keep an eye out for Powderface Trail on your left, heading south. From Canmore, turn south onto Hwy 40, turn east on Hwy 68, and watch for Powderface Trail on your right. Follow Powderface Trail for 3km to the winter gate at Dawson Recreation Area on your left.
title: Cox Hill Trail
